title: Canyon Ultimate TDF limited edition Wildcard design celebrates 108th Tour de France
content:
Canyon’s Ultimate CF SLX Disc carbon road bike gets a new TDF Wildcard ultra limited edition for this year’s 108th running of the Tour de France. Celebrating their Alpecin-Fenix and Arkéa-Samsic sponsored teams who both earned wildcard slots in the Tour, Canyon is making two decks of cards worth (including Jokers…twice 52+2) of the TDF […]

The post Canyon Ultimate TDF limited edition Wildcard design celebrates 108th Tour de France appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
